**This month of December we're having a special offer you won't want to miss: use the code "winter" and get a 15% Lifetime discount** (restrictions apply).

Providing you with 24/7 Customer care support, 99.99% guaranteed uptime since the year 2006. No setup fees. We also work with customized solutions and on a month to month basis if preferred, no contract necessary.

Our Datacenter is located in New Jersey, United States.

**Promo code "winter" will be valid until December 31/2015**, don't miss out on this great opportunity!
